BuffData.DynamicTooltip:
Blood WellUpon taking fatal damage, Aatrox extracts the current blood in the well plus 35% of the well's total pool and recovers it as Health over 3 seconds.

When using an ability that costs Health, Aatrox stores 100% of the self-inflicted damage into the Blood Well and gains up to @f2@% Attack Speed based on how full the Blood Well is.

225 second Cooldown and decays by 2% a second while out of combat.
